about_the_game:
Classics with a new twist


Crystal Void takes a new twist on puzzle classics like Tetris and Pipe Dream with rogue-lite mechanics.
Each run is unique with a new set of dangers and bonuses that can overturn the situation at any moment.

Sci-fi story told between the blocks


PGV "Moritz", the planetary-grade generator spaceship has contracted a mysterious crystalline infection somewhere en route between the stars. Deadly crystals are rapidly spreading across the vessel, tearing up the hull and making vital systems inoperable. For the unarmed and unprepared crew, the last chance for survival is to use their only weapon: the massive power plant capable of running the whole colony.

But even as the surges of energy shatter the crystals, the infection keeps spreading through the ducts and shafts.

It is up to you, whether "Moritz" will prevail in this ruthless race or become a crystalline tomb left adrift in the vast and lifeless void.

Key features


  • Rouge-lite approach to the puzzle classics: each run has a unique set of conditions.
  • Sci-fi retrofutiristic grahics, inspired by 80th science fiction illustrations and animated movies.
  • Diverse challenge modes, offering even more perspectives on core mechanics.
  • Free modes for endless entertainment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 3.x, Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz and higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 400 series and newer, AMD Radeon HD 5000 Series and newer, Intel HD Graphics in Intel Ivy Bridge and newer
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
